author: Harper Lee
bookDescription: A gripping portrayal of racial injustice and moral growth in a small Southern town.

author: George Orwell
bookDescription: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society, where the government constantly monitors and manipulates its citizens.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
